title: Database Management Systems
content:
Core Concepts

A DBMS stores, retrieves, and manages data.

  • ACID Properties: Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability. crucial for transactions.
  • Normalization: Process to reduce redundancy. 1NF, 2NF, 3NF, BCNF.
  • SQL vs NoSQL: Relational vs Non-relational databases.

SQL Basics

SELECT * FROM Users WHERE Age > 18;
